com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.indexes

Class SecondaryIndexQuery<T,S,U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.basho.riak.client.api.RiakCommand<S,U>
      • com.basho.riak.client.api.commands.indexes.SecondaryIndexQuery<T,S,U>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type being used for the query.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BigIntIndexQuery, BinIndexQuery, IntIndexQuery, RawIndexQuery

    public abstract class SecondaryIndexQuery<T,S,U>
extends RiakCommand<S,U>
    A Secondary Index Query.

    Serves as a base class for all 2i queries.

    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Brian Roach
